name: Baby Rush! GO! GO! GO!+ The Chao Babies
name_original: Baby Rush! GO! GO! GO!+ The Chao Babies
description:
The Chao Babies (EXTRA)- is a 2 Player Game (WASD-P2, ARROW-P1)

P1 activates the red button and P2 activates the blue button to open the door

It's like FireBoy and WaterGirl

Can you get to room 10?
